Html:
I just read in the Ribbon roadmap that you are going to be removing the RibbonCommand and instead use more standard commands with the visual aspects (image, text) being set on the individual ribbon items.  The RibbonCommand works out quite well for our application and it would be nice to see it stay.

Would it be possible to instead support both a RibbonCommand and other ICommands.  The ribbon controls could adapt to the visuals of the RibbonCommand if their command was a RibbonCommand, otherwise the visuals would need to be set on the controls themselves?
